title: Piet van den Bergh
text: Piet van den Bergh (30 November 1865 – 29 April 1950) was a Dutch <a href="painter">painter</a>. His work was part of the <a href="Art%20competitions%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics%23Painting">painting event</a> in the <a href="Art%20competitions%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics">art competition</a> at the <a href="1928%20Summer%20Olympics">1928 Summer Olympics</a>.
